title: I Have Hidden £10,000 For You To Find - Clue 2
description: In this Max Fosh video, he provides the second clue in a treasure hunt for £10,000 hidden in the UK. He discusses theories from his Reddit thread, including people searching grit bins and referencing Twin Peaks. The video is sponsored by Surfshark VPN, which allows users to access content from different countries. Max also interviews a mystery treasure hunt expert and reveals clue number two on a USB stick.
summary: Max Fosh provides the second clue in a £10,000 treasure hunt, discusses theories from his Reddit thread, and promotes Surfshark VPN.
style: Treasure hunt prank with comedic elements and sponsor integration.
payoff: The comedic payoff comes from Max's deadpan delivery of absurd theories, the unexpected sponsor integration with Surfshark VPN, and the mysterious clue provided by a hidden expert. The video keeps viewers engaged with a mix of humor, intrigue, and clever promotion.
